text: Billa (stylised BILLA) is an Austrian supermarket chain. It has over 1,600 locations in Europe with over a thousand in Austria alone. They also operate in the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Bulgaria, Romania, Russia, Croatia and Ukraine. Billa was founded by Karl Wlaschek in 1953, and are owned by Germany's REWE Group. ==Other websites== * Category:1953 establishments in Europe Category:Companies of Austria Category:Supermarkets of Europe Category:1950s establishments in Austria
title: Billa (supermarket)
